rows.label: qev075401_MSG0001
rows.name:
Ho, [ST:playername ]! Did you see a strange
human pass by with a bunch of tectonic puges in tow?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075401_JNK0010
rows.name: Reply

rows.label: qev075401_SEL0011
rows.name: Say that you haven't seen anything like that.

rows.label: qev075401_JNK0020
rows.name: Query

rows.label: qev075401_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Gi Zang what the heck he's talking about.

rows.label: qev075401_MSG0002
rows.name: Bah! Well, thank you anyway.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075401_MSG0003
rows.name:
I still don't know what happened, it was so sudden.
A pack of tectonic puges hit my camp out of nowhere![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075401_MSG0004
rows.name: A pack of tectonic puges hit my camp out of nowhere.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075401_MSG0005
rows.name:
While I was distracted, my sword was stolen by a
human who was clearly controlling them.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075401_MSG0006
rows.name:
What was I thinking, losing my grandfather's sword
like that?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075401_MSG0007
rows.name:
This is more important to me than my pride.
I beg you, my friend—help me retrieve it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075401_MSG0008
rows.name: Thank you. He could not have gone far.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075401_MSG0009
rows.name:
And he must be the only human around here with
tectonic puges as pets. We should have little trouble
tracking him down.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075401_MSG0010
rows.name:
I shall keep looking in this area if you can check the
ruined city of O'rrh Sim.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075401_MSG0011
rows.name:
I need that sword to maintain my place as a Hellion.
I have to retrieve it, whatever it takes![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075401_MSG0012
rows.name: Sorry to leave all the work to you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075401_JNK0030
rows.name: Worry

rows.label: qev075401_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask Gi Zang if he's all right.

rows.label: qev075401_JNK0040
rows.name: Query

rows.label: qev075401_SEL0041
rows.name: Ask Gi Zang whether he found his sword.

rows.label: qev075401_MSG0013
rows.name:
I was caught off guard and knocked out for a bit—
but it takes more than that to kill someone who has
been through training like mine.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075401_MSG0014
rows.name: And I found my sword. Everything worked out, but...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075401_MSG0015
rows.name: Yes, he had it. It's just...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075401_MSG0016
rows.name:
Every time trouble rears its head, I keep relying on you
to bail me out while I fumble about uselessly.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075401_MSG0017
rows.name:
Perhaps I'm not worthy of my grandfather's sword in
the first place.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075401_MSG0018
rows.name:
...My friend, could I ask you to hold on to it until I'm
strong enough to beat you in a match?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075401_JNK0050
rows.name: Accept

rows.label: qev075401_SEL0051
rows.name: Solemnly take Gi Zang's sword.

rows.label: qev075401_JNK0060
rows.name: Refuse

rows.label: qev075401_SEL0061
rows.name: Say that it's too important for you to take.

rows.label: qev075401_MSG0019
rows.name: Thank you. I know that you will take good care of it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075401_MSG0020
rows.name: I need you to hold on to it BECAUSE it's so important.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075401_MSG0021
rows.name:
I cannot take no for an answer on this one,
for I am sure my grandfather would approve.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075401_MSG0022
rows.name:
This is only a temporary situation, you understand.
Soon I will match your strength, and on that day I will
reclaim my weapon and prove myself a true Hellion.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075401_MSG0023
rows.name:
You had best be ready the next time we meet.
Until then, take care.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075401_MSG0024
rows.name: I'm all done on my end. Looks like you are as well![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075401_MSG0025
rows.name:
Heh. I almost feel bad for those fools.
They didn't stand a chance.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075401_JNK0070
rows.name: Celebrate

rows.label: qev075401_SEL0071
rows.name: Smile and give Gi Zang a high five.

rows.label: qev075401_JNK0080
rows.name: Fight

rows.label: qev075401_SEL0081
rows.name: Challenge Gi Zang to another match.

rows.label: qev075401_MSG0026
rows.name:
We would have made a hell of a team if you had been
born a Wrothian.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075401_MSG0027
rows.name:
We would have had the Ganglion running scared!
What a waste that you are human. Ha ha ha![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075401_MSG0028
rows.name:
But hey, we can still spar, right? I've been training like
a madman since the last time, so don't expect this
round to be so easy![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075401_MSG0029
rows.name:
Seriously? ...I can't believe that I'm saying this,
but is fighting the only thing you think about?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075401_MSG0030
rows.name:
Let's hold off until we're both in top condition.
I've been training like a madman since our last round,
so you're in for a surprise![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075401_MSG0031
rows.name:
My sword reclaimed, I now return to New LA.
Perhaps I'll get in some training by busting a few
Ganglion heads along the way.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075401_MSG0032
rows.name:
For I still need to grow stronger, and the Ganglion
body count is nowhere near enough yet to make up
for everyone I have lost![ST:wait ]
